Activity: Start the day with a refreshing smoothie and some positive affirmations. Gotta keep that vibe high!
Check emails and address any urgent requests. Review the UHNWI onboarding checklist to ensure all steps are accounted for.

Coordinate with @Compliance Officer and @Legal Counsel to conduct a final review of all client documentation, subscription agreements, and communication materials. Ensure full adherence to regulations.
Address any outstanding compliance concerns and make necessary revisions to the documentation and communication materials.
Develop a training program for internal staff on the new UHNWI onboarding process. Ensure everyone understands their roles and responsibilities.
Lunch Time! Trying out a new restaurant with some coworkers. Always up for an adventure!
Present the training program to relevant teams, including sales, client service, and compliance. Answer any questions and address any concerns.
Update the client relationship management (CRM) system with all relevant information about the UHNWI onboarding process. Ensure all data is accurate and easily accessible.
Conduct a mock onboarding session with a colleague to test the process and identify any potential issues.
Refine the onboarding process based on the results of the mock session. Ensure a smooth and seamless experience for UHNWI clients.
Prepare for Friday, focusing on finalization of tasks and planning for next week.
